product_name: Oboz Lightning Trail-Running Shoes - Men's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The quick and responsive Oboz Lightning trail-running shoes deliver aggressive traction and a cushioned ride for comfort mile after mile. Highly breathable nylon mesh uppers and synthetic leather overlays deliver lightweight support and abrasion protection. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture, dry quickly and further enhance breathability. Deluxe footbeds offer extra cushioning, support and comfort. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning over long trail runs; hard EVA plates protect against stone bruising and provide additional support. Nylon midfoot shanks offer lateral and torsional stability, increasing surefootedness on varied terrain. High friction carbon rubber outsoles on the Oboz Lightning trail-running shoes feature asymmetric lugging to optimize braking and propulsion. Closeout.
short_description: The quick and responsive Oboz Lightning trail-running shoes deliver aggressive traction and a cushioned ride for comfort mile after mile.
